ygData.subject: Re: New Darkforge Stats!
ygData.msgSnippet: bp: 20 gloves: 12 arms: 11 boots: 11 all non-ac stats remain the same. haven t turned in the other crap yet. kg
ygData.messageBody:
bp: 20
gloves: 12
arms: 11
boots: 11

all non-ac stats remain the same. haven't turned in the other crap yet.

kg
